ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars The Mando and Paz Vizla Armor Set
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This add Mando(Din Djarin) and Paz Vizla Armor set from star wars Show "The Mandalorian"
!!!!!!!!!Weapon are not included!!!!!!!!!
Note: no CE patch yet, Must have "Jetpack mod" by Pelador to use Paz Vizla Personal Jetpack to work
[h1]Features:[/h1] -The Mando(Din Djarin) Armor Set -Paz Vizla Armor Set -Paz Vizla Personal Jetpack
[h1]Crafting Requirements:[/h1] -Craftable -Research Requirements: PoweredArmor
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Star Wars: The Mandalorian - Pelador - Thanks for Patching on the jetpack mod
